esper:listen.statement: insert into TotalOrderByCity select distinct customer.city as city, count(*) as total from OrderPedido.win:time(1 day) group by customer.city
esper:listen.doc:name: Total Order by City Today

esper:listen.statement: insert into TotalOrderByDate select distinct date as date, count(*) as total from OrderPedido.win:time(1 day) group by date
esper:listen.doc:name: Total Order Today

esper:listen.statement: insert into TotalOrderByTimeFrame select '10secs' as timeFrame, sum(totalOrder) as valueTotal, count(*) as qtdeTotal from OrderPedido.win:time(10 sec)
esper:listen.doc:name: Total Order Last 10 Secs

esper:listen.statement: insert into TotalOrderByTimeFrame select '30secs' as timeFrame, sum(totalOrder) as valueTotal, count(*) as qtdeTotal from OrderPedido.win:time(30 sec)
esper:listen.doc:name: Total Order Last 30 secs

esper:listen.statement: insert into TotalOrderByTimeFrame select 'HigherOrder60secs' as timeFrame, max(totalOrder) as valueTotal, count(*) as qtdeTotal from OrderPedido.win:time(60 sec)
esper:listen.doc:name: Higher Order Last 60 secs

esper:listen.statement: insert into TotalOrderByTimeFrame select 'SumOrderValue' as timeFrame, sum(totalOrder) as valueTotal, count(*) as qtdeTotal from OrderPedido
